HDG.DL.content: explanation (Erläuterung) of hermeneutics may issue (versteht) in a discussion (Erörterung) [Trakl essay] > hermenuein to hermeneus to Hermes (playful thought more compelling than rigor of sense): divine messenger, brings message of destiny (Botschaft des Geschickes) > hermeneuein: explanation that brings tidings (Kunde), can listen to a message > Plato’s Ion: poets “are interpreters (hermenes) of gods” > hermeneutics not just interpretation but the bearing (das Bringen) of message/tidings

HDG.DL.content: transformation (Verwandlung) of thinking occurs as a passage (Wanderung), one site left for another, sites placed in discussion (Erörterung), one site (Ort) is metaphysics, the other we leave w/out a name [overcoming metaphysics] > in leaving behind metaphysics, Heidegger leaves behind aesthetics grounded in metaphysics: in such a way that we can give thought to nature of aesthetics, direct it back (verweisen) w/in its boundaries

HDG.LP.content: Trakl’s “blue wild game”: countering glance (Gegenblick) of human nature, thought of stranger’s steps, illumined by holy; “blue wild game”: names mortals who think of stranger, wander w/ him to home (Einheimische) of human being > they are few/unknown who begin such journey: what is of the essence occurs (ereignet) rarely, suddenly, in quiet [instant, event]

HDG.LP.content: Das Wesen der singenden Seele ist dann nur noch ein einziges Vorausschauen in die Bläue der Nacht, die jene stillere Frühe birgt [moral image of thought] [Gegenblick?] > nature of apartness is perfected (vollendet) [MOP? pure bastard?] > perfect site of poetic work: gathers those who died early, followed the stranger (gathers both stiller childhood & stranger’s grave)

HDG.WL.content: Humboldt: language an activity (energeia), continual intellectual effort (Arbeit des Geistes) to make articulated sound capable of expressing thought—only totality of this speaking can be regarded as language [i.e. the thought & the articulation?]

HDG.WL.content: what is speaking (Sprechen), the expression of thought, if we think of its origin as the inner activity of spirit (inneren Geistestätigkeit)? > acc. modern thought, labor of spirit (Arbeit des Geistes) is a setting/positing (Setzen) (thesis), spirit conceived as subject, represented w/in subject-object model (Schema), so positing must be synthesis btwn subject/object

HDG.WL.content: to say (Sagen) and to speak (Sprechen) aren’t identical > a man can speak endlessly w/out saying anything > Sage means to show (zeigen), to let appear (erscheinen), let be seen/heard [going to point out the self-evident, though hardly a thought has been given it]

HDG.WL.content: thinking must stop thinking we are thinking of “Being” as appropriation, Ereignis is richer than any conceivable definition of Being > Being, however, can be thought of, re: its origin, in terms of Ereignis [beyond Being]

HDG.EC.content: because devastation is deeper, comes from farther away, our thoughts return to it again and again > the devastation of earth, the annihilation (Vernichtung) of human essence: evil itself (das Böse selbst) > evil not as the morally bad, the reprehensible, but as malice (Bösartige)

HDG.EC.content: doesn’t this thought that Being is malicious (bösartig) in the Ground of its essence (im Grunde seines Wesens) place an awful demand (arge Zumutung) on human thinking? > even more when one should not regard the idea that evil dwells in essence of Being as pessimistic > that thinking should be easy is a thought from spirit of devastation [spirit of revenge?]

HDG.EC.content: the unnecessary is most necessary of all, only one who has learned this understands pain of human barred from thinking > thinking is thus the unnecessary, and yet thinking has a high rank of honor: the highest > I know this but don’t know the Grund of this > as if Occident couldn’t wait until thinking finds its originary essence: perhaps pure waiting, ability to wait [slow down, hastiness (Übereilung) of thinking thought as ratio, rationality]

HDG.EC.content: can only think older definition man, mortal, by way of the younger, thinker, so that only common interpretation of zōon logon echon is shallow > we can think logos originally as gathering, human is thus in the gathering toward the originally all-unifying One (auf das urspünglich alles einigende Eine) > in this thought of logos thinking and mortality think the self same (im Grunde das Selbe) > older, like everything inceptual (Anfängliche), harder (schwerer) to think [finitude as thnētos]

HDG.EC.content: the coming: that before (voraus) which nothing can be thought, the unprethinkable (das Unvordenkliche) [cf. Derrida to-come] > what heals can’t be set forth in propositional statements (in aussagenden Sätzen darstellen), but only conversationally surmised (gesprächsweise vermuten) [Derrida would say it can only be marked on the margins, nor would he call it what heals]

HDG.OHF.content: historical consciousness gives itself task of overviewing “total fact of man (die ganze Tatsache Mensch),” bringing Dasein into view absolutely objectively > in this approach to past, the present of Dasein (Gegenwart des Daseins) is before itself in equally objective manner, & so is the future (not yet [Noch-nicht], just the present when calculated, anticipated by way of comparison): Spengler’s “decline of the West” not cheap witticism or whim, but consequential expression of historical consciousness: its inauthenticity thought through to the end [i.e. if we think of everything in this reductive way, then we have reduced our future]
